valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Sun 4 Jan 2026 to 06:00 (UTC) on Mon 5 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low just west of Rockall 1022 expected Sole 1014 by midnight tonight. Low North Utsire 999 expected Forties 1002 by same time

Viking.text:
Wind
In west, northerly 5 to 7 becoming cyclonic 3 to 5. In east, cyclonic 3 to 5.
Sea state
In west, rough, occasionally very rough at first. in east, rough or very rough becoming moderate or rough.
Weather
Squally snow showers.
Visibility
Good, occasionally very poor.
